attributes.review: Uh this app is horrible. I got scared right when I opened it because I saw this big orange thing. It was disgusting!!🤮. I don’t know what it was but I broke the screen of my phone because I got scared. This app is a one star rating because it’s constantly glitching and lagging!😡
attributes.title: I saw Donald Duck 🦆
